#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
            int test;
            cin>>test;
            while(test--)
            {
                int num;
                cin>>num;
                if(num==0)
                continue;
                int loop=num%25,i,j;
                for(i=loop;i>=0;i--)
                {       if(loop!=0)
                    cout<<(char )('a' +i);
                }
                loop=num/25;
                for(i=0;i<loop;i++)
                {   for(j=25;j>=0;j--)
                    cout<<(char )('a' +j);
                }
                cout<<"\n";
            }
            return 0;
}
